mn28:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn28:1.3_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn28:1.5_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
mn28:2.1_1: yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṁ pāṇānaṁ padajātāni sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṁ gacchanti,
mn28:2.2_1: ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbete catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṁ gacchanti.
mn28:2.4_0: Dukkhe ariyasacce, dukkhasamudaye ariyasacce, dukkhanirodhe ariyasacce,
mn28:3.2_0: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ,
mn28:3.2_2: yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ; saṅkhittena, pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā.
mn28:6.4_0: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ kakkhaḷaṁ kharigataṁ upādinnaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
mn28:6.5_0: kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṁsaṁ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṁ vakkaṁ hadayaṁ yakanaṁ kilomakaṁ pihakaṁ papphāsaṁ antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariyaṁ karīsaṁ,
mn28:6.5_1: yaṁ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ kakkhaḷaṁ kharigataṁ upādinnaṁ.
mn28:6.7_0: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu, yā ca bāhirā pathavīdhātu, pathavīdhāturevesā.
mn28:6.8_1: na meso attā’ti—evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mn28:6.9_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā pathavīdhātuyā nibbindati,
mn28:7.2_0: Antarahitā tasmiṁ samaye bāhirā pathavīdhātu hoti.
mn28:7.3_1: bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā tāva mahallikāya aniccatā paññāyissati, khayadhammatā paññāyissati, vayadhammatā paññāyissati,
mn28:7.4_0: Kiṁ panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ‘ahanti vā mamanti vā asmī’ti vā? Atha khvāssa notevettha hoti.
mn28:8.1_1: bhikkhuṁ pare akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti, so evaṁ pajānāti:
mn28:8.3_0: Sā ca kho paṭicca, no apaṭicca.
mn28:8.6_0: So phasso aniccoti passati, vedanā aniccāti passati, saññā aniccāti passati, saṅkhārā aniccāti passati, viññāṇaṁ aniccanti passati.
mn28:8.7_0: Tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
mn28:9.1_1: bhikkhuṁ pare aniṭṭhehi akantehi amanāpehi samudācaranti—
mn28:9.4_0: ‘tathābhūto kho ayaṁ kāyo yathābhūtasmiṁ kāye pāṇisamphassāpi kamanti, leḍḍusamphassāpi kamanti, daṇḍasamphassāpi kamanti, satthasamphassāpi kamanti.
mn28:9.6_2: tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti.
mn28:9.7_0: Āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ bhavissati asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
mn28:9.8_0: Kāmaṁ dāni imasmiṁ kāye pāṇisamphassāpi kamantu, leḍḍusamphassāpi kamantu, daṇḍasamphassāpi kamantu, satthasamphassāpi kamantu,
mn28:10.1_1: bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhāti.
mn28:10.3_0: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ,
mn28:10.4_0: yassa me evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato,
mn28:10.5_1: suṇisā sasuraṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
mn28:10.6_1: tassa ce bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato,
mn28:10.7_0: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ,
mn28:10.7_1: yassa me evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato,
mn28:10.8_1: bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato,
mn28:10.8_2: evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhāti, so tena attamano hoti.
mn28:10.9_0: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
mn28:11.4_0: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ āpo āpogataṁ upādinnaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
mn28:11.5_0: pittaṁ semhaṁ pubbo lohitaṁ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttaṁ,
mn28:11.5_1: yaṁ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ āpo āpogataṁ upādinnaṁ—
mn28:11.7_0: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā āpodhātu yā ca bāhirā āpodhātu, āpodhāturevesā.
mn28:11.8_1: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mn28:11.9_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā āpodhātuyā nibbindati, āpodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
mn28:12.2_0: Sā gāmampi vahati, nigamampi vahati, nagarampi vahati, janapadampi vahati, janapadapadesampi vahati.
mn28:12.3_1: samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde yojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti,
mn28:12.4_1: samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde sattatālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, chattālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti,
mn28:12.4_3: catuttālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, titālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, dvitālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, tālamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti.
mn28:12.5_1: samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde sattaporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti,
mn28:12.5_4: catupporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, tiporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti,
mn28:12.6_1: samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde aḍḍhaporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti,
mn28:12.7_1: yaṁ mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṁ na hoti.
mn28:12.8_1: bāhirāya āpodhātuyā tāva mahallikāya aniccatā paññāyissati, khayadhammatā paññāyissati, vayadhammatā paññāyissati,
mn28:13.1_0: Kiṁ panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ‘ahanti vā mamanti vā asmī’ti vā?
mn28:14.1_1: bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato,
mn28:14.1_2: evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhāti. So tena attamano hoti.
mn28:15.1_0: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
mn28:16.4_0: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ tejo tejogataṁ upādinnaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
mn28:16.5_0: yena ca santappati, yena ca jīrīyati, yena ca pariḍayhati,
mn28:16.5_1: yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṁ sammā pariṇāmaṁ gacchati,
mn28:16.5_2: yaṁ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ tejo tejogataṁ upādinnaṁ—
mn28:16.7_0: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā tejodhātu yā ca bāhirā tejodhātu, tejodhāturevesā.
mn28:16.8_1: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mn28:16.9_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā tejodhātuyā nibbindati, tejodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
mn28:17.2_0: Sā gāmampi dahati, nigamampi dahati, nagarampi dahati, janapadampi dahati, janapadapadesampi dahati.
mn28:17.3_0: Sā haritantaṁ vā panthantaṁ vā selantaṁ vā udakantaṁ vā ramaṇīyaṁ vā bhūmibhāgaṁ āgamma anāhārā nibbāyati.
mn28:17.4_1: samayo yaṁ kukkuṭapattenapi nhārudaddulenapi aggiṁ gavesanti.
mn28:17.5_1: bāhirāya tejodhātuyā tāva mahallikāya aniccatā paññāyissati, khayadhammatā paññāyissati, vayadhammatā paññāyissati,
mn28:17.6_0: Kiṁ panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ‘ahanti vā mamanti vā asmī’ti vā?
mn28:18-20.1_0: Atha khvāssa notevettha hoti …pe… tassa ce, āvuso,
mn28:18-20.1_1: bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhāti, so tena attamano hoti.
mn28:18-20.2_0: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
mn28:21.4_0: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ vāyo vāyogataṁ upādinnaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
mn28:21.5_0: uddhaṅgamā vātā, adhogamā vātā, kucchisayā vātā, koṭṭhāsayā vātā, aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātā, assāso passāso iti,
mn28:21.5_1: yaṁ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ vāyo vāyogataṁ upādinnaṁ—
mn28:21.7_0: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā vāyodhātu, yā ca bāhirā vāyodhātu, vāyodhāturevesā.
mn28:21.8_0: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama nesohamasmi na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mn28:21.9_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā vāyodhātuyā nibbindati vāyodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
mn28:22.2_0: Sā gāmampi vahati, nigamampi vahati, nagarampi vahati, janapadampi vahati, janapadapadesampi vahati.
mn28:22.3_1: samayo yaṁ gimhānaṁ pacchime māse tālavaṇṭenapi vidhūpanenapi vātaṁ pariyesanti,
mn28:22.4_1: bāhirāya vāyodhātuyā tāva mahallikāya aniccatā paññāyissati, khayadhammatā paññāyissati, vayadhammatā paññāyissati,
mn28:22.5_0: Kiṁ panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ‘ahanti vā mamanti vā asmī’ti vā? Atha khvāssa notevettha hoti.
mn28:23.1_1: bhikkhuṁ pare akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti.
mn28:23.2_1: uppannā kho me ayaṁ sotasamphassajā dukkhā vedanā.
mn28:23.3_0: Sā ca kho paṭicca, no apaṭicca.
mn28:23.6_0: Sopi phasso aniccoti passati, vedanā aniccāti passati, saññā aniccāti passati, saṅkhārā aniccāti passati, viññāṇaṁ aniccanti passati.
mn28:23.7_0: Tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
mn28:24.1_1: bhikkhuṁ pare aniṭṭhehi akantehi amanāpehi samudācaranti,
mn28:24.2_0: So evaṁ pajānāti ‘tathābhūto kho ayaṁ kāyo yathābhūtasmiṁ kāye pāṇisamphassāpi kamanti, leḍḍusamphassāpi kamanti, daṇḍasamphassāpi kamanti, satthasamphassāpi kamanti.
mn28:24.3_0: Vuttaṁ kho panetaṁ bhagavatā kakacūpamovāde “ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave,
mn28:24.3_1: kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṁ. Tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya, na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti.
mn28:24.4_0: Āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ bhavissati asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
mn28:24.5_0: Kāmaṁ dāni imasmiṁ kāye pāṇisamphassāpi kamantu, leḍḍusamphassāpi kamantu, daṇḍasamphassāpi kamantu, satthasamphassāpi kamantu.
mn28:25.1_1: bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato,
mn28:25.1_2: evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhāti.
mn28:25.3_0: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ.
mn28:25.4_0: Yassa me evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato,
mn28:25.4_1: evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātī’ti.
mn28:25.5_1: suṇisā sasuraṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
mn28:25.6_1: tassa ce bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato,
mn28:25.8_0: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ.
mn28:25.9_0: Yassa me evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato,
mn28:25.10_1: bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato,
mn28:25.10_2: upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhāti, so tena attamano hoti.
mn28:25.11_0: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
mn28:26.1_1: kaṭṭhañca paṭicca valliñca paṭicca tiṇañca paṭicca mattikañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito agārantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
mn28:26.2_1: aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṁsañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
mn28:27.1_1: bāhirā ca rūpā na āpāthaṁ āgacchanti,
mn28:27.1_3: neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
mn28:27.2_1: cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti,
mn28:27.2_3: neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
mn28:27.3_2: bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti.
mn28:28.1_0: Yaṁ tathābhūtassa rūpaṁ taṁ rūpupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati,
mn28:28.1_1: yā tathābhūtassa vedanā sā vedanupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati,
mn28:28.1_2: yā tathābhūtassa saññā sā saññupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati,
mn28:28.1_3: ye tathābhūtassa saṅkhārā te saṅkhārupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchanti,
mn28:28.1_4: yaṁ tathābhūtassa viññāṇaṁ taṁ viññāṇupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati.
mn28:28.3_0: ‘evañhi kira imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ saṅgaho sannipāto samavāyo hoti.
mn28:28.6_0: yo dhammaṁ passati so paṭiccasamuppādaṁ passatī”ti.
mn28:28.8_0: Yo imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chando ālayo anunayo ajjhosānaṁ so dukkhasamudayo.
mn28:28.9_0: Yo imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, so dukkhanirodho’ti.
mn28:28.10_0: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
mn28:37.1_1: bāhirā ca dhammā na āpāthaṁ āgacchanti no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti,
mn28:37.1_2: neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
mn28:38.1_0: Ajjhattiko ceva, āvuso, mano aparibhinno hoti,
mn28:38.1_3: neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
mn28:38.2_2: bāhirā ca dhammā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti,
mn28:38.3_0: Yaṁ tathābhūtassa rūpaṁ taṁ rūpupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati,
mn28:38.3_1: yā tathābhūtassa vedanā sā vedanupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati,
mn28:38.3_2: yā tathābhūtassa saññā sā saññupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati,
mn28:38.3_3: ye tathābhūtassa saṅkhārā te saṅkhārupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchanti,
mn28:38.3_4: yaṁ tathābhūtassa viññāṇaṁ taṁ viññāṇupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati.
mn28:38.5_0: ‘evañhi kira imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ saṅgaho sannipāto samavāyo hoti.
mn28:38.8_0: yo dhammaṁ passati so paṭiccasamuppādaṁ passatī”ti.
mn28:38.10_0: Yo imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chando ālayo anunayo ajjhosānaṁ so dukkhasamudayo.
mn28:38.11_0: Yo imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ so dukkhanirodho’ti.
mn28:38.12_0: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hotī”ti.
mn28:38.14_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
